title: (x) "Bayside Tigers" simple sans serif - Helvetica {J Edward Sanchez}
content:
This is an easy one and I know that there are many typefaces that look very similar, but I just wanted the exact ID. Can anyone help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905090340im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/101_4421.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Classic Cover insurance logo classic script - Commercial Script {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905090340/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40866 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Tagline on John Carpenter's "Christine" movie poster - Albertus {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905090340/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40859 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zap_rowsdower
